preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 1.30 g of potassium (K).
2. Weigh out 2.80 g of rubidium (Rb).
3. Weigh out 19.90 g of selenium (Se).
4. In a clean, dry glass container, add the potassium followed by the rubidium.
5. Slowly add the selenium powder to the mixture while stirring to ensure even distribution.
